title: [BUG] SKTypefacefont.FontWeight for Montserrat font not working properly in Linux
body:
**Description**

When creating a typeface using Montserrat font name and SKFontStyleWeight as normal and save the typeface as stream and then take the typeface from that stream, the font weight is wrong in Linux environment.

**Code**

`SKTypeface skTypeFace = SKTypeface.FromFamilyName("Montserrat",SKFontStyleWeight.Normal, SKFontStyleWidth.Normal, SKFontStyleSlant.Upright);`
`//Check font weight created from name.`
`Console.WriteLine(skTypeFace.FontWeight);`
`SKStreamAsset stream = skTypeFace.OpenStream();`
`SKTypeface sKTypefacefont = SKTypeface.FromStream(stream);`
`//Check font weight created from stream.`
`Console.WriteLine(sKTypefacefont.FontWeight);`


Font file:

[Montserrat-Regular.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/9111881/Montserrat-Regular.zip)


**Expected Behavior**
When creating font using OpenStream(), Font weight should be 400 in Linux as same as Windows.

**Actual Behavior**

When creating font using OpenStream(), Font weight is 100.
In windows it is working properly as 400. But in Linux it is not working properly.


**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  v2.88.0-preview.209
- IDE:  Microsoft Visual Studio Professional 2019 Version 16.10.3
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
  
  - Linux:  docker  Linux container
NuGets used: SkiaSharp.v2.88.0-preview.209, SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux v2.88.0-preview.209
  


**Reproduction Link**

Run the above code snippet in Windows and Linux
